title: Why keep playing yasuo??
body: Aye egocentric noob players stop playing yasuo plz... it's pretty obvious dat u r no better than other players in ur MMR range. Why play the shitty champ and decide to make things harder for not only u but for ur teammates as well. Plz unless  ur skill is twice superior than Ur opponent laner, plzzzzz stop fuking up my MMR.

replies.body:
Read my mind. This was my last game.... gave me a chuckle reading this after that.

http://i64.tinypic.com/5uh26t.jpg
What's wrong with the champion Yasuo?
Yes! im low elo (gold) and I havnt seen a single yas win lane or let alone do good. its sad
Holy crap, I can't agree more!!!!
